title: "A Simple Eye Exam Could Explain Why Females Are Underdiagnosed With Autism"
excerpt: "Females are often underdiagnosed with being on the autism spectrum because they often mask their symptoms more successfully than males. The key to understanding why may be in a simple eye exam."
